mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_menu_role ( id, role_id, menu_id, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{roleId}, #{menuId}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, role_id AS roleId, menu_id AS menuId, created_by AS createdBy, created_time AS createdTime, updated_by AS updatedBy, updated_time AS updatedTime FROM tb_menu_role WHERE role_id = #{roleId}
